amendment.description: Amendment sought to preserve Supreme Court review of appeals related to the constitutionality of the Pledge of Allegiance.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered two printed in House Report 108-693 to strike the following in section 1632 of title 28, United States Code, as added by section 2(a) of the bill: ", and the Supreme Court shall have no appellate jurisdiction,".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Watt amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 202 - 217 (Roll no. 466).
